actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

actions.in_subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to study the suitability and feasibility of designating the Wolf House, located in Norfolk, Arkansas, as a unit of the National Park System, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior, acting through the Director of the National Park Service, to: (1) study and report to specified congressional committees on the suitability and feasibility of designating the Wolf House located on Highway 5 in Norfolk [sic], Arkansas, as a unit of the National Park System; and (2) consider management alternatives for the Wolf House.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to study the suitability and feasibility of designating the Wolf House, located in Norfolk, Arkansas, as a unit of the National Park System, and for other purposes.
